system.description: Your extensive battlesuit training allows you to pilot with the same defensive reflexes you would use on foot.
system.benefit: Whilst Piloting the Battlesuit, the Character can use the Pilot(Personal) Skill in place of Acrobatics, Dodge, and Parry Tests.

prerequisites.text: Tau Battlesuit Pilot Alternative Advance, 1000xp, Agility 45+, Talented(Pilot)

specialAbilities.name: Pilot Substitution
specialAbilities.description: While piloting a Battlesuit, use Pilot(Personal) skill instead of Acrobatics, Dodge, or Parry tests.
